event.description: Ryan Roberts called out on strikes.
John McDonald singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Justin Upton singles on a ground ball to center fielder Angel Pagan. John McDonald to 3rd. Justin Upton advances to 2nd, on fielding error by center fielder Angel Pagan.
Miguel Montero singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Melky Cabrera. John McDonald scores. Justin Upton out at home on the throw, left fielder Melky Cabrera to catcher Chris Stewart.
Chris Young pops out to catcher Chris Stewart in foul territory.
Lyle Overbay singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nate Schierholtz.
Konrad Schmidt strikes out swinging.
Marc Krauss grounds out softly, pitcher Tim Lincecum to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Lyle Overbay to 2nd.
Rusty Ryal flies out to center fielder Angel Pagan.
Pitcher Change: Eric Surkamp replaces Tim Lincecum.
Ryan Roberts lines out to center fielder Angel Pagan.
John McDonald grounds out, shortstop Brandon Crawford to first baseman Aubrey Huff.
Justin Upton walks.
Miguel Montero pops out to second baseman Mike Fontenot.
Chris Young homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Lyle Overbay grounds out, first baseman Aubrey Huff to pitcher Eric Surkamp.
Konrad Schmidt singles on a line drive to center fielder Angel Pagan.
Marc Krauss triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Konrad Schmidt scores.
Pitcher Change: Hector Correa replaces Eric Surkamp.
Rusty Ryal doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Marc Krauss scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Jacob Elmore replaces Rusty Ryal.
Ryan Roberts strikes out on foul tip.
John McDonald lines out to shortstop Brandon Crawford.
Pitcher Change: Guillermo Mota replaces Hector Correa.
Justin Upton singles on a ground ball to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Miguel Montero lines out to third baseman Pablo Sandoval.
Chris Young singles on a sharp line drive to center fielder Angel Pagan. Justin Upton to 2nd.
Lyle Overbay walks. Justin Upton to 3rd. Chris Young to 2nd.
Konrad Schmidt grounds out softly, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to first baseman Aubrey Huff. Justin Upton scores. Chris Young to 3rd. Lyle Overbay to 2nd.
Marc Krauss singles on a ground ball to center fielder Angel Pagan, deflected by shortstop Brandon Crawford. Chris Young scores. Lyle Overbay scores.
Jacob Elmore flies out to left fielder Melky Cabrera.
Defensive Substitution: Gregor Blanco replaces center fielder Angel Pagan, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Tyler Graham replaces left fielder Melky Cabrera, batting 2nd, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Brett Pill replaces first baseman Aubrey Huff, batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Emmanuel Burriss replaces shortstop Brandon Crawford, batting 8th, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Hector Sanchez replaces catcher Chris Stewart, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Jeremy Affeldt replaces Guillermo Mota.
Ryan Roberts homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
John McDonald lines out softly to third baseman Pablo Sandoval.
Justin Upton singles on a line drive to left fielder Tyler Graham.
Miguel Montero lines out to center fielder Gregor Blanco.
Chris Young walks. Justin Upton to 2nd.
Lyle Overbay flies out to left fielder Tyler Graham.
Defensive switch from center field to right field for Gregor Blanco.
Defensive Substitution: Conor Gillaspie replaces third baseman Pablo Sandoval, batting 4th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Gary Brown replaces right fielder Nate Schierholtz, batting 5th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Joaquin Arias replaces second baseman Mike Fontenot, batting 7th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Sergio Romo replaces Jeremy Affeldt.
Konrad Schmidt doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Tyler Graham.
Marc Krauss grounds out, second baseman Joaquin Arias to first baseman Brett Pill. Konrad Schmidt to 3rd.
Jacob Elmore singles on a line drive to left fielder Tyler Graham. Konrad Schmidt scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Ryan Wheeler replaces Ryan Roberts.
Ryan Wheeler grounds into double play, first baseman Brett Pill to shortstop Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Brett Pill. Jacob Elmore out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Steve Edlefsen replaces Sergio Romo.
Cody Ransom lines out to shortstop Emmanuel Burriss.
Cole Gillespie flies out to center fielder Gary Brown.
Ryan Budde grounds out, shortstop Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Brett Pill.
Pitcher Change: Jean Machi replaces Steve Edlefsen.
Keon Broxton walks.
With Tommy Manzella batting, Keon Broxton steals (1) 2nd base.
Tommy Manzella walks.
Konrad Schmidt grounds into a force out, second baseman Joaquin Arias to shortstop Emmanuel Burriss. Keon Broxton to 3rd. Tommy Manzella out at 2nd. Konrad Schmidt to 1st.
Marc Krauss grounds into double play, second baseman Joaquin Arias to shortstop Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Brett Pill. Konrad Schmidt out at 2nd.
Angel Pagan grounds out, shortstop John McDonald to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Melky Cabrera flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Aubrey Huff walks.
Pablo Sandoval flies out to center fielder Chris Young.
Nate Schierholtz singles on a line drive to right fielder Justin Upton.
Brandon Belt singles on a ground ball to right fielder Justin Upton. Nate Schierholtz to 3rd.
Mike Fontenot walks. Brandon Belt to 2nd.
Brandon Crawford singles on a ground ball to right fielder Justin Upton. Nate Schierholtz scores. Brandon Belt scores. Mike Fontenot to 3rd.
Chris Stewart grounds into double play, shortstop John McDonald to second baseman Rusty Ryal to first baseman Lyle Overbay. Mike Fontenot scores. Brandon Crawford out at 2nd.
Angel Pagan pops out to third baseman Ryan Roberts in foul territory.
Pitcher Change: Wade Miley replaces Josh Collmenter.
Melky Cabrera grounds out, third baseman Ryan Roberts to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Aubrey Huff flies out to center fielder Chris Young.

Jacob Elmore remains in the game as the second baseman.

Mike Fontenot flies out to left fielder Marc Krauss.
Pitcher Change: Zach Kroenke replaces Wade Miley.
Brandon Crawford flies out to center fielder Chris Young.
Chris Stewart lines out to shortstop John McDonald.
Angel Pagan singles on a ground ball to center fielder Chris Young.
With Melky Cabrera batting, Angel Pagan steals (1) 2nd base.
Melky Cabrera doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Marc Krauss. Angel Pagan scores.
Aubrey Huff flies out to right fielder Justin Upton.
Defensive Substitution: Ryan Budde replaces catcher Miguel Montero, batting 4th, playing catcher.
Pablo Sandoval grounds out, shortstop John McDonald to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Nate Schierholtz grounds out softly, catcher Ryan Budde to first baseman Lyle Overbay.
Brandon Belt singles on a line drive to center fielder Chris Young.
Mike Fontenot strikes out swinging.
Ryan Wheeler remains in the game as the first baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Cody Ransom replaces shortstop John McDonald, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Cole Gillespie replaces right fielder Justin Upton, batting 3rd, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Keon Broxton replaces center fielder Chris Young, batting 5th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Tommy Manzella replaces first baseman Lyle Overbay, batting 6th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Sam Demel replaces Zach Kroenke.
Emmanuel Burriss flies out to left fielder Marc Krauss.
Hector Sanchez homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Gregor Blanco strikes out swinging.
Tyler Graham grounds out, third baseman Tommy Manzella to first baseman Ryan Wheeler.
Pitcher Change: Jensen Lewis replaces Sam Demel.
Brett Pill flies out to center fielder Keon Broxton.
Conor Gillaspie grounds out to first baseman Ryan Wheeler.
Gary Brown flies out to right fielder Cole Gillespie.
Pitcher Change: Yonata Ortega replaces Jensen Lewis.
Brandon Belt homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Joaquin Arias flies out to center fielder Keon Broxton.
